column1: Local Foods////So the whole point of coming here is getting a sandwich which also comes with a couple of sides.  To be quite honest
column2: I'm not entirely sold on the sides.  Some are good
column3: others are just mediocre.  Most of the veggies in the sides are farmer's market fresh
column4: so there's that.  That's a huge plus in my book
column5: but when oil and seasonings are added to uber fresh vegetables
column6: they lose their magic.  The sandwiches themselves are excellent (the bread!)
column7: albeit a little heavy on the condiments.  If you get the lox/bagel sandwich
column8: just know there is quite a pile of cream cheese.  It and the egg salad sandwich are my two favorites.  However...
